summary: ON WAY TO LOCAL STORE POWER STEERING WENT OUT. HAVING TO STEER WITH MUCH EFFORT. STOPPED AND  TRIED TO TURN IGNITION OFF SEVERAL TIMES AND RESTART, BUT DID NOT WORK. IT INITIALLY WENT OUT WHILE IN MOTION ON WAY TO STORE AFTER ACCELERATING FROM STOP SIGN.  NOTICED IT WHEN I HAD TO MAKE A RIGHT TURN AT NEXT CORNER.  AND PANEL WARNING LIGHT CAME ON.
